[SYNTAX]: Complex sentence structures may impede smooth reading for some readers.
[LEXICON]: Archaic vocabulary (e.g., "thou", "whilst" implied in context) might require additional interpretation time.

[CLARITY]: Assumed prior knowledge of historical figures/events (e.g., Thomas Becket's significance) without brief contextualization for potentially uninformed readers.
